Parameter.name: SrcVer
Parameter.Description: Location and Revision of this file in Perforce (Auto-updating)

XData.name: Display
XData.Data: <composite xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/zen/report/display" xmlns:auxxstyle="http://www.intersystems.com/zen/report/display/auxx/style"> <class name="table.auxxlettertext" > <att name="keep-with-next.within-line" value="auto" /> <att name="keep-with-previous" value="always" /> <att name="width" value="100%" /> <att name="table-layout" value="fixed"/> </class> <class name="th.auxxlettertext"> <att name="keep-with-next.within-line" value="auto" /> <att name="font-family" value="Arial" /> <att name="font-size" value="12pt"/> <att name="font-weight" value="bold"/> <att name="padding-before" value="2pt" /> <att name="border-after-style" value="solid"/> <att name="border-after-color" value="black"/> <att name="border-after-width" value="1.5pt"/> </class> <class name="td.auxxlettertext"> <att name="font-family" value="Arial" /> <att name="font-size" value="12pt"/> <att name="font-weight" value="normal"/> <att name="display-align" value="before" /> <att name="padding-before" value="2pt" /> <att name="keep-together.within-page" value="always" /> </class> </composite>
